Detailed Description

Closes a window, when the action is executed.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CloseWindowAction::CloseWindowAction (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

CloseWindowAction::CloseWindowAction (  Dispatcher *  dispatcher,
Window *  win,
const WString &  text,
const ImageObtainer &  icon = ImageObtainer()
) 
 

Parameters:
dispatcher Dispatcher which will be informed about property changes. Usually a window or control is used as dispatcher.
win Pointer to the window, which should be closed.
text Text of the item. The GUI-component using the item decides whether the text will be shown.
icon Icon of the item. The GUI-component using the item decides whether the icon will be shown.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN CloseWindowAction::Execute (   )  [virtual]
 

Closes the window, which was set with the constructor or the method Init.

Reimplemented from Action.

Initializes the instance by reading out a resource file generated by ARAGON. This method may not be invoked by the MMI in a direct manner and might be changed in future releases.
